# PRIMAL
print "### Solve problem ###"; print "";
reset; reset data;

## Set options
model cluster.mod;
data wine2.dat;
option solver cplex;
option cplex_options 'timing 1';
solve;

print "### Matrix x (formulation) ###"; print "";
#display x;


print "### Number of points per cluster ###"; print "";

var total{i in 1..m};

for{i in 1..m} {
	for{j in 1..m}{
		let total[i] := total[i] + x[j,i];
	}
} 


display total;
EOF
